title: Wavelog Recent QSOs
description: Display your recent logged QSOs from Wavelog. Only shows contacts within the configured time window.

wavelog_url.title: Wavelog URL
wavelog_url.description: Base URL of your Wavelog instance (e.g., http://localhost/wavelog or https://log.example.com)

fetch_method.title: Fetch Method
fetch_method.description: How to retrieve QSOs. 'api' uses the REST API, 'mysql' queries the database directly.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your Wavelog API key (read-only is fine). Must belong to the user who owns the station profile. Get from Wavelog > Account > API Keys.

db_host.title: Database Host
db_host.description: MySQL host (only for mysql fetch method).

db_pass.title: Database Password
db_pass.description: MySQL password (only for mysql fetch method).

max_qsos.title: Max QSOs to Show
max_qsos.description: Maximum number of recent QSOs to display.

max_age_minutes.title: Max Age (minutes)
max_age_minutes.description: Only show QSOs newer than this many minutes. Set to 60 for 1 hour.

fetch_interval.title: Refresh Interval (seconds)
fetch_interval.description: How often to check for new QSOs.

display_mode.title: Display Mode
display_mode.description: 'ticker' shows 3 QSOs in rows, 'cards' shows one QSO at a time with full details.

display_duration.title: Display Duration (seconds)
display_duration.description: How long to show this plugin in Vegas mode rotation.
